items.title: Typhoon Ragasa Disrupts Ports and Power Grids
items.summary: Super Typhoon Ragasa halted container throughput and knocked out regional grids, straining Asian trade arteries just as inventories rebuilt.

items.title: Thailand’s Credit Outlook Cut to Negative
items.summary: Fitch shifted Thailand’s sovereign outlook to negative, citing fiscal slippage and governance risks that bring a downgrade closer.

items.title: Typhoon Ragasa Triggers Port & Power Disruptions
items.summary: After landfall, Typhoon Ragasa forced extended port closures and power rationing across coastal hubs, rippling through shipping lanes.

items.title: Daily Trigger Monitor -- 2025‑09‑25
items.summary: Daily roundup of trigger scores, macro catalysts, and positioning shifts recorded on 25 September 2025.

items.title: Western Plains Megafarms Strain the Grid
items.summary: Mega-farm irrigation and processing loads in the western plains are pulling data-center level power, pressuring rural grids.

items.title: Thailand Placed on Sovereign Watch
items.summary: Ratings agencies moved Thailand onto watch status as fiscal deficits widen and debt metrics deteriorate.

items.title: Gulf Port Terminal Outage Disrupts Trade
items.summary: A 36-hour outage at a Gulf container terminal stalled throughput and aggravated global shipping congestion.

items.title: Daily Trigger Monitor — 2025‑09‑24
items.summary: Daily trigger monitor with cross-market stress signals captured on 24 September 2025.

items.title: China Power Grid Stress Surges
items.summary: Surging summer demand and coal shortages pushed China’s grid toward rolling blackouts, underscoring structural power risk.

items.title: Regional Banks Face CRE Maturity Wall
items.summary: Regional lenders face a wall of commercial real estate maturities with delinquencies climbing and refinancing scarce.

items.title: Panama Canal Drought Restricts Shipping Traffic
items.summary: Historic drought forced the Panama Canal to cap transits, bottlenecking container and LNG flows worldwide.

items.title: Office Crash Triggers Record CRE Loan Defaults
items.summary: Office valuations collapsed, driving record CRE loan defaults and stressing bank balance sheets.

items.title: H5N1 Bird Flu Spreads in Mammals, Sporadic Human Cases
items.summary: H5N1 jumped into mammals with sporadic human cases, reviving pandemic risk concerns.

items.title: Global Freight Indices Slump on Weak Demand
items.summary: Global freight indices slumped as demand softened, signaling weaker trade and shipping revenues.

items.title: France Downgrade as Yields Converge with Italy
items.summary: France’s downgrade and OAT/BTP spread convergence highlighted rising fiscal strain across core Europe.

items.summary: Daily risk brief covering leaderboard moves and macro triggers for 23 September 2025.

items.title: China’s Hidden Local Debt Threatens Financial Stability
items.summary: China’s opaque local government financing vehicles threaten financial stability despite restructuring pledges.

items.title: China Property Crisis Deepens with Developer Defaults
items.summary: Developer defaults deepened China’s property slump, amplifying credit stress across the system.

items.title: AI Data Center Boom Tests Grid Limits
items.summary: The AI data center boom is testing grid headroom, forcing utilities to ration new capacity.
